title: Record of a Thousand Lives - Novel Updates
tags: Alchemy   Blacksmith   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Elemental Magic   Elves   Game Elements   God Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Necromancer   Overpowered Protagonist   Pets   Righteous Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Second Chance   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Time Loop   Time Travel   Transported to Another World
author: Flatter
description:
He died because he could not kill ‘him’.

He lived because he could not kill ‘him’.

Kang Yoonsoo, who had lived 999 lives by losing to the Demon Emperor.

Once again, he went back twenty years in time, back to his starting point.

“I will end this.”

Either he dies, or ‘he’ dies.

The thousandth life of a man who has mastered all the skills in the world begins.>
